data.comment: The match is underway in Vitoria-Gasteiz.
Santiago Jaime Latre signals a free kick to Alaves.
Throw-in for Alaves in the half of Valencia.
In the minute 2, Corner awarded to Alaves.
In the minute 2, Alaves's Ximo Navarro scores with his head to give his side a 1-0 lead.
That's a fine assist from Lucas Perez.
Alaves to take a throw-in in Valencia territory.
Free kick for Valencia in their own half.
In the minute 5, Throw-in for Valencia in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Vitoria-Gasteiz.
Throw-in for Alaves at Estadio de Mendizorroza.
In the minute 6, Santiago Jaime Latre signals a Valencia throw-in in Alaves's half.
Free kick Valencia.
Valencia have been awarded a corner by Santiago Jaime Latre.
In the minute 8, Gabriel Paulista (Valencia) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Ball goes out of play for a Alaves goal kick.
Alaves are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 12, Corner awarded to Alaves.
Alaves have been awarded a corner by Santiago Jaime Latre.
Alaves have been awarded a penalty in Vitoria-Gasteiz...
In the minute 14, Throw-in for Alaves close to the penalty box.
Goal! The home team extend their lead to 2-0 thanks to a penalty from Lucas Perez.
Joselu for the home team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 18, Santiago Jaime Latre signals a free kick to Valencia in their own half.
Goal kick for Valencia at Estadio de Mendizorroza.
Yunus Musah for Valencia is whistled offside.
In the minute 20, Santiago Jaime Latre awards Valencia a goal kick.
Can Alaves get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Valencia's half?
Alaves's Jota is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 26, Free kick for Valencia in the half of Alaves.
Alaves awarded a free kick in their own half.
Santiago Jaime Latre signals a free kick to Alaves in their own half.
In the minute 30, Alaves advance rapidly upfield but Santiago Jaime Latre blows for offside.
Can Alaves capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Free kick for Valencia in their own half.
In the minute 31, Valencia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Vitoria-Gasteiz a free kick has been awarded the away team.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 33, Throw-in Alaves.
Santiago Jaime Latre signals a free kick to Valencia.
Free kick Alaves.
Free kick for Valencia in the half of Alaves.
In the minute 37, Alaves's Florian Lejeune has been booked in Vitoria-Gasteiz.
Valencia are pushing forward but Kevin Gameiro's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 38, Alaves have a goal kick.
Valencia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Alaves awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 39, In Vitoria-Gasteiz a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Alaves in their own half.
Santiago Jaime Latre signals a free kick to Alaves in their own half.
In the minute 44, Ball safe as Valencia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Santiago Jaime Latre signals a Valencia throw-in in Alaves's half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Vitoria-Gasteiz.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Estadio de Mendizorroza.
The second-half is underway in Vitoria-Gasteiz.
Corner awarded to Alaves.
In the minute 48, Valencia have been awarded a corner by Santiago Jaime Latre.
Santiago Jaime Latre signals a free kick to Valencia.
In Vitoria-Gasteiz Valencia attack through Denis Cheryshev. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 51, Alaves have a goal kick.
Free kick Valencia.
In Vitoria-Gasteiz a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 53, Hugo Guillamon (Valencia) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Can Valencia capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Alaves's half?
Santiago Jaime Latre awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 56, Manu Garcia is replacing Jota for the home team.
Valencia awarded a free kick in their own half.
The away team replace Denis Cheryshev with Manu Vallejo.
In the minute 58, Goncalo Guedes is replacing Kang In Lee for Valencia at Estadio de Mendizorroza.
Corner awarded to Valencia.
Ball goes out of play for a Alaves goal kick.
In the minute 64, Free kick for Alaves in their own half.
Throw-in Alaves.
Can Valencia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Alaves's half?
In the minute 68, Valencia have been awarded a corner by Santiago Jaime Latre.
Valencia drives forward and Goncalo Guedes gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Free kick for Alaves in the half of Valencia.
In the minute 70, John Guidetti is on a sub for Joselu for Alaves.
The home team have replaced Lucas Perez with Borja Sainz. This is the third substitution made today by Pablo Machin.
Santiago Jaime Latre signals a free kick to Valencia in their own half.
Manu Vallejo strikes to reduce the deficit to 2-1 at Estadio de Mendizorroza.
In the minute 72, Kevin Gameiro with an assist there.
Free kick for Valencia in their own half.
In the minute 76, In Vitoria-Gasteiz a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 77, Free kick for Valencia in the half of Alaves.
Goal! Hugo Guillamon (Valencia) levels the score at 2-2 with a header in Vitoria-Gasteiz.
Great play from Carlos Soler to set up the goal.
Santiago Jaime Latre awards Alaves a goal kick.
Alaves awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 82, Alaves awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Alaves in their own half.
Throw-in for Alaves in the half of Valencia.
In the minute 84, Santiago Jaime Latre awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Alaves is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Daniel Wass of Valencia gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 86, Goal kick for Alaves at Estadio de Mendizorroza.
Santiago Jaime Latre signals a free kick to Valencia in their own half.
Alaves's Luis Rioja is whistled for offside at Estadio de Mendizorroza.
In the minute 88, Alaves drive upfield and Manu Garcia gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Valencia defender.
Free kick for Valencia in their own half.
Alaves needs to be cautious. Valencia have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 89, Valencia are coming forward and Uros Racic gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Alaves at Estadio de Mendizorroza.
Corner awarded to Valencia.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Vitoria-Gasteiz.
8 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Alaves close to the penalty box.
Free kick in a good position for Alaves!
Valencia's Kevin Gameiro misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Alaves goal kick.
Valencia's Manu Vallejo gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Alaves have a goal kick.
Valencia awarded a free kick in their own half.
The match is over. Final score 2-2.
Javi Gracia (Valencia) is making a third substitution, with Lato Toni replacing Jose Luis Gaya.
